運動.例句: Baseball is a popular sport in Japan.
運動.翻譯: 棒球是日本很受歡迎的運動。

運動.例句: I love swimming in the summer.
She takes tennis lessons on Tuesdays.
My brother plays soccer with his friends.
We played volleyball on the beach.
Running is good for your health.
They played dodgeball in PE class.
運動.翻譯: 他們在體育課上玩躲避球。

運動.例句: I play badminton with my sister.

交通工具.例句: We took a taxi to the airport.
I go to school by bus every day.
They crossed the river by boat.
My brother rides a scooter to work.
交通工具.翻譯: 我哥哥騎滑板車（或小機車）去上班。

交通工具.例句: He bought a new motorcycle last week.
交通工具.翻譯: 他上週買了一台新機車。

交通工具.例句: We are flying to Japan by airplane.
The rescue team arrived by helicopter.
The ambulance came quickly after the accident.
交通工具.翻譯: 事故發生後救護車迅速趕到。

交通工具.例句: She rides her bicycle in the park.
A big truck delivered the goods.
交通工具.翻譯: 一輛大卡車運送了貨物。

交通工具.例句: My dad drives a red car.
交通工具.翻譯: 我爸爸開一台紅色的汽車。

地形.例句: We climbed the mountain last summer.
地形.翻譯: 我們去年夏天爬了那座山。

地形.例句: The house is on a hill overlooking the lake.
地形.翻譯: 那間房子在山丘上俯瞰湖泊。

地形.例句: A river runs through the valley.
Cows were grazing on the plain.
Camels live in the desert.
They spent their honeymoon on a tropical island.
地形.翻譯: 他們在熱帶島嶼度蜜月。

地形.例句: Italy is a peninsula in southern Europe.
地形.翻譯: 義大利是位於南歐的半島。

地形.例句: We walked along the coast and watched the sunset.
地形.翻譯: 我們沿著海岸散步看夕陽。

地形.例句: Children are playing on the beach.
地形.翻譯: 孩子們正在海灘上玩耍。

地形.例句: The castle stands on a cliff by the sea.
地形.翻譯: 城堡矗立在海邊的懸崖上。

地形.例句: Bats live in the cave.
The volcano erupted suddenly.
The river flows through the forest.
We swam in the lake during the summer.
The waterfall was beautiful and loud.
Alligators live in the swamp.
They camped in the forest.
A glacier moves very slowly.
The canyon was carved by a river.
地形.翻譯: 峽谷是被河水沖蝕出來的。

地形.例句: The boat anchored in the bay.

農場動物.例句: The cow gives us fresh milk.
農場動物.翻譯: 乳牛提供我們新鮮的牛奶。

農場動物.例句: The pig is rolling in the mud.
The sheep are eating grass in the field.
The goat climbed the hill easily.

農場動物.翻譯: 那些雞咯咯叫得很大聲。

農場動物.例句: The duck is swimming in the pond.
She rides her horse every morning.
We saw a turkey on the farm.
農場動物.翻譯: 我們在農場看到一隻火雞。

農場動物.例句: The goose honked loudly at us.
農場動物.翻譯: 那隻鵝對我們大聲鳴叫。

野生動物.例句: The lion is the king of the jungle.
The tiger moved silently in the forest.
野生動物.翻譯: 老虎在森林中悄悄行動。

野生動物.例句: The elephant has a long trunk.
野生動物.翻譯: 大象有一條長長的鼻子。

野生動物.例句: Monkeys love to swing on trees.
野生動物.翻譯: 猴子喜歡在樹上盪來盪去。

野生動物.例句: The giraffe has a very long neck.
Zebras have black and white stripes.
野生動物.翻譯: 斑馬有黑白相間的條紋。

野生動物.例句: The bear is catching fish in the river.
Wolves live and hunt in packs.
野生動物.翻譯: 狼成群結隊地生活與狩獵。

野生動物.例句: The hippopotamus is resting in the water.
The crocodile opened its huge mouth.

身體.例句: He hit his head on the door.
She washed her face with cold water.
My left eye is itchy.
I can hear music with my ears.
My nose is stuffy.
Open your mouth and say “Ah”.
I brush my teeth twice a day.
He burned his tongue on the soup.
My neck hurts after sleeping.
She carried the bag on her shoulder.
I hurt my arm during basketball.
He rested his elbow on the table.
Wash your hands before eating.
I cut my finger while cooking.
He crossed his arms over his chest.
My stomach hurts.
He has pain in his back.
She broke her leg while skiing.
My knee is sore after running.
I stepped on a stone with my foot.
He stubbed his toe on the chair.

教室.例句: The teacher is writing on the board.
Each student has a textbook.
教室.翻譯: 每位學生都有一本課本。

教室.例句: I put my notebook on the desk.
教室.翻譯: 我把筆記本放在書桌上。

教室.例句: She sat on a small chair.
The teacher drew a cat on the blackboard.
教室.翻譯: 老師在黑板上畫了一隻貓。

教室.例句: We used white chalk to write.
He cleaned the board with an eraser.
I wrote down the homework in my notebook.
教室.翻譯: 我把作業寫在筆記本裡。

教室.例句: This is our English textbook.
She sharpened her pencil.
I signed my name with a blue pen.
We use a ruler to draw straight lines.
My bag is full of books.
I opened the window for fresh air.
He closed the door quietly.
The clock shows it’s 3 PM.
教室.翻譯: 時鐘顯示現在是下午三點。

教室.例句: We use the computer for typing.
The projector showed a big image.
She wrote today’s date on the whiteboard.
教室.翻譯: 她在白板上寫下今天的日期。

教室.例句: The marker ran out of ink.

服飾.例句: I bought new clothing for the summer.
He is wearing a blue shirt today.
服飾.翻譯: 他今天穿著一件藍色的襯衫。

服飾.例句: She loves wearing jeans because they are comfortable.
服飾.翻譯: 她喜歡穿牛仔褲，因為很舒服。

服飾.例句: It's cold outside, so I need to wear a jacket.
服飾.翻譯: 外面很冷，我需要穿夾克。

服飾.例句: These shoes are too tight for me.
服飾.翻譯: 這雙鞋對我來說太緊了。

服飾.例句: She wore a red skirt to the party.
服飾.翻譯: 她穿了一條紅色的裙子。

服飾.例句: She looks beautiful in that dress.
服飾.翻譯: 她穿那條洋裝看起來很美。

服飾.例句: He put on a sweater because it was chilly.
服飾.翻譯: 他因為有點冷而穿上了毛衣。

服飾.例句: She wore a big hat to protect herself from the sun.
服飾.翻譯: 她戴了一頂大帽子以保護自己免受陽光照射。

服飾.例句: He wrapped a scarf around his neck.
She wore a white blouse to the meeting.
服飾.翻譯: 她穿著一件白色的女性襯衫參加會議。

食物.例句: They served delicious food at the party.
食物.翻譯: 他們在派對上提供了美味的食物。

食物.例句: She ate an apple for breakfast.
He bought fresh bread from the bakery.
食物.翻譯: 他從麵包店買了新鮮的麵包。

食物.例句: I like to eat rice with vegetables.
They ordered a large pizza for dinner.
食物.翻譯: 他們點了一個大比薩當晚餐。

食物.例句: Grilled chicken is her favorite dish.
食物.翻譯: 烤雞肉是她最喜歡的菜。

食物.例句: She made a healthy salad for lunch.
食物.翻譯: 她做了一個健康的沙拉當午餐。

食物.例句: He enjoys eating pasta with tomato sauce.
食物.翻譯: 他喜歡吃番茄醬義大利麵。

食物.例句: They had a chocolate cake for dessert.
食物.翻譯: 他們用巧克力蛋糕當甜點。

食物.例句: She made a bowl of hot soup for dinner.
食物.翻譯: 她做了一碗熱湯當晚餐。

食物.例句: She loves eating noodles with beef.
He made a ham and cheese sandwich for lunch.
食物.翻譯: 他做了一個火腿起司三明治當午餐。

食物.例句: They ate dumplings with soy sauce for dinner.
食物.翻譯: 他們吃了蘸醬油的水餃當晚餐。

食物.例句: We had hotpot for dinner with various meats and vegetables.
食物.翻譯: 我們晚餐吃了火鍋，裡面有各種肉類和蔬菜。

飲料.例句: She ordered a cold beverage with her lunch.
飲料.翻譯: 她點了一杯冷飲配她的午餐。

飲料.例句: Would you like some orange juice?
He drank a can of soda during the movie.
飲料.翻譯: 他在看電影時喝了一罐汽水。

飲料.例句: My grandmother drinks tea every afternoon.
飲料.翻譯: 我奶奶每天下午都喝茶。

飲料.例句: I need a cup of coffee to start my day.
飲料.翻譯: 我需要一杯咖啡來開始我的一天。

飲料.例句: Kids often drink milk for strong bones.
飲料.翻譯: 小孩常喝牛奶來強健骨骼。

飲料.例句: She made a banana smoothie for breakfast.
飲料.翻譯: 她早餐做了一杯香蕉冰沙。

飲料.例句: It's important to drink enough water every day.
飲料.翻譯: 每天喝足夠的水很重要。

飲料.例句: Lemonade is refreshing on a hot day.
飲料.翻譯: 炎熱的天氣裡檸檬水很清爽。

水果.例句: She eats an apple every morning.
水果.翻譯: 她每天早上吃一顆蘋果。

水果.例句: I drank a glass of orange juice.
They picked grapes from the vineyard.
水果.翻譯: 他們從葡萄園採了葡萄。

水果.例句: Mango is my favorite tropical fruit.
水果.翻譯: 芒果是我最喜歡的熱帶水果。

水果.例句: He gave me a juicy peach.
水果.翻譯: 他給了我一顆多汁的水蜜桃。

水果.例句: Kiwis are rich in vitamin C.

動詞.例句: I like to eat pizza on weekends.
She drinks coffee every morning.
He runs five kilometers every day.
We walk to school together.
She is reading a new book.
I write emails at work.
動詞.翻譯: 我在工作時寫電子郵件。

動詞.例句: The baby sleeps for eight hours.
They talk on the phone every night.
Listen to the teacher carefully.
We watch movies on Friday nights.
動詞.翻譯: 我們星期五晚上看電影。

動詞.例句: Please open the window.
Close the door gently.
I want to buy a new phone.
They sell fresh fruit at the market.
動詞.翻譯: 他們在市場賣新鮮水果。

動詞.例句: She makes delicious cakes.
I have to do my homework.
We go to the park every Sunday.
動詞.翻譯: 我們每個星期天都去公園。

動詞.例句: Come here and look at this.
The children play soccer after school.
Can you help me with this bag?
動詞.翻譯: 你可以幫我拿這個袋子嗎？
